title: SC EP:45 Bigfoot destroyed my camper
itunes:title: SC EP:45 Bigfoot destroyed my camper
description: We talk to a law enforcement official who also served in the special forces. He shares with us an encounter he had as a child, and an encounter his brother had where Sasquatch destroyed a camper trailer with him in it. We will also see if he is willing to share some stories and encounters special forces had with Sasquatch here in the states...
content:encoded: We talk to a law enforcement official who also served in the special forces. We will also see if he is willing to share some stories and encounters special forces had with Sasquatch here in the states...
